## 65. WOMAN
### Definition
Most generic term for an adult human female. Avoid relationship or kinship terms, where different. Avoid specific terms for younger or older women. Avoid honorific terms, e.g. "lady", etc. (CoBL)

### Contexts
1. Men are doing [X], women are making [Y]. (GLD) 2. Women bear children, men do not. (GLD)
